input: Her mommy took her to the dog pound so that she could choose one that she wanted. [SEP] How often do they visit the dog pound? [SEP] once a hour

In one of the paintings, a character has been cut out and is instead sitting on the painting's frame, perhaps taking a break from posing? [SEP] What did the artist do when he finished the painting? [SEP] the artist threw the painting into the trash before he finished it

In January 1785, Hamilton attended the second meeting of the New York Manumission Society (NYMS). [SEP] How often is the meeting of NYMS held? [SEP] the meeting of nyms is held twice a week

Over 200 Arawak sites have been identified, and it is said that when the Spanish arrived in Jamaica there were approximately 100,000 Arawak living on the island. [SEP] How many times a year did the Spanish visit Jamaica? [SEP] annually every year
